attributes.action: Allow school days to be 4 days
attributes.additional_details: It will make all kids from everywhere happy just let it happen
attributes.background: To change school days to 4 days as kids get 2 days of a break then it’s work work work kids need this

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Change the school week to a four day week:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643506
